item.title: Craftsman Automation Ltd Hits All-Time High at Rs.8068.75, Marking a Milestone in Market Performance

item.title: Manaksia Aluminium Company Ltd Surges 20% to Hit Upper Circuit Amid Robust Buying Pressure
item.description: Manaksia Aluminium Company Ltd witnessed a remarkable surge on 6 Jan 2026, hitting its upper circuit limit of 20% to close at ₹40.26, marking a new 52-week high. This extraordinary rally was driven by intense buying interest, resulting in a maximum permissible daily gain and triggering a regulatory trading freeze. The stock’s performance significantly outpaced its sector and benchmark indices, reflecting strong investor confidence amid sustained positive momentum. Time: 52 minutes ago
